data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Rheims, Cristina A., Barreiros, José Augusto P., Brescovit, Antonio D., Bonaldo, Alexandre B. (2005): Notes on spiders of the genus Scytodes Latreille (Arachnida, Araneae, Scytodidae) from the Ferreira Penna Scientific Station, Pará, Brazil. Zootaxa 836: 1-7, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.273206
